name: The Wither - Uni Project
description:
(CREDITS below) If you fail the platforming at the start reset scene. Be aware there's wall jumping as well where you need to jump back and forth between walls.

Movement - Left / Right arrows

Jump - Spacebar

Reset scene - Enter

Shoot healing flame - X

Credits:

All art and animations were done by myself.

A big thank you to my fellow colleagues and friends on feedback and playtesting :) 

Song: 

Diamond Knight - StreamBeats 
https://www.streambeats.com/
https://www.youtube.com/c/StreamBeatsbyHarrisHeller
